name: The Spiderbot
description:
In this game, you'll play as a mechanical spider going through an abandoned city trying to collect 5 robo-gems as fast as possible!

Pink indicators on the HUD and minimap show where the collectibles are.

Controls: Left mouse click (LC) (SPACE BAR ALSO WORKS) 

LC hold - directional arrow spins clockwise

Double LC and hold - directional arrow spins counter-clockwise

Release LC - move in the direction of arrow

Spam/mash LC - Restart run
